statements: UPDATE feedback SET rating = 4.5 WHERE player_id = 123 AND game_id = 456;
UPDATE feedback SET comment = 'Great game!' WHERE game_id = 789 AND player_id = 456;
UPDATE feedback SET rating = 4.5, comment = 'Great game!' WHERE player_id = 123 AND game_id = 456;
UPDATE feedback SET comment = 'Needs improvement', rating = 3.2 WHERE game_id = 789 AND player_id = 789;
UPDATE PlayerFeedback SET rating = 4.5, feedback = 'Great job!' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE GameReviews SET rating = 5, review = 'Amazing game!', timestamp = '2023-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE review_id = 3;
UPDATE PlayerFeedback SET rating = 4.5, feedback = 'Great game!' WHERE player_id = 123
UPDATE GameReviews SET review = 'Not impressed', rating = 2, timestamp = '2022-01-20 10:30:00' WHERE player_id = 456
UPDATE PlayerFeedback SET player_name='Alice', rating=4.5 WHERE feedback_id=1;
UPDATE GameReviews SET rating=3.8, review_text='Fun game with great graphics' WHERE review_id=5;
UPDATE PlayerFeedback SET rating = 4.5, player_name = 'John Doe' WHERE feedback_id = 1001;
UPDATE GameReviews SET review_text = 'This game is amazing!', date_posted = '2022-09-15 10:30:00' WHERE review_id = 2005;
UPDATE player_feedback SET feedback_text = 'Great game, loving it!', creation_date = '2022-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE player_id = 12345;
UPDATE game_feedback SET helpful_votes = 10, feedback_date = '2022-10-17 15:45:00', feedback_text = 'The game experience was amazing!' WHERE game_id = 54321 AND player_id = 98765;
UPDATE player_feedback SET creation_date = '2021-10-15 08:30:00' WHERE player_id = 1;
UPDATE review SET rating = 4, review_text = 'Great game, highly recommended!' WHERE player_id = 2 AND review_id = 5;
UPDATE reviews SET rating = 4, review_text = 'Great game!' WHERE review_id = 1;
UPDATE players SET registration_date = '2022-06-01' WHERE player_id = 3;
UPDATE reviews SET rating = 4, review_text = 'Updated review text' WHERE review_id = 1;
UPDATE developers SET company_name = 'New Company Name', founding_date = '2022-01-01' WHERE developer_id = 2;
